mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentiBoard (num, mentiNum, country, city, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardPoint) VALUES(Null, #{userNum}, #{country}, #{city}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardDate}, #{boardPoint})
mapper.select: SELECT num FROM mentiuser WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT num FROM mentiBoard WHERE mentiNum = #{num}

SELECT mb.num, mentiNum, mb.country, mb.city, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardLike, boardPoint, IFNULL(profile_image, 0) profile_image FROM mentiBoard mb LEFT OUTER JOIN mentiuser mu ON mb.mentiNum = mu.num WHERE mb.country = #{countryDBname} ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 4;
mapper.insert: INSERT into ${userType}point (num, mentiNum, mentiboardnum, currentPoint, spendDate, spendAmount) VALUES (Null, #{mentiNum}, #{mentiboardnum}, #{currentPoint}, #{spendDate}, #{spendAmount})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mentiboard WHERE boardTitle LIKE #{search} UNION (SELECT * FROM mentiboard WHERE boardContent LIKE #{search});
SELECT num, mentiNum as userNum, country, city, boardTitle, boardContent, boardDate, boardLike, boardPoint FROM mentiBoard WHERE num = #{num}
SELECT num mentorNum FROM mentoruser where id = #{id}
SELECT boardPoint mentorNum FROM mentiboard WHERE num = #{boardNum}

SELECT boardNum, mentiNum, mentorNum, mentorreplyContent, replyDate, id, password, nickname, profile_image, email, gender, city, country FROM mentiboardreply mb LEFT OUTER JOIN mentoruser mu on mu.num = mb.mentorNum WHERE boardNum = #{num};
SELECT IFNULL(currentRepPoint,0) FROM mentorreppoint WHERE mentorNum = #{mentorNum} ORDER BY num DESC LIMIT 1;
SELECT boardNum, COUNT(boardNum) countNum FROM( (SELECT mentiLikesBoardnum boardNum FROM mentilikespost) UNION ALL (SELECT mentorLikesBoardnum boardNum FROM mentorlikespost))m GROUP BY boardNum;
SELECT * FROM mentiboard WHERE country = #{country} ORDER BY num DESC
